name: Intermind
description:
Controls: WASD - Movement,  E - Interact

A short adventure-puzzle game where you play as an average man in a park. Walk around and interact to learn more about the world you are in. Mystery awaits...

This game was made for the SGDA 2022 summer game jam in 6 days. The game theme followed the prompt of “Game Over Isn’t the End."

Watch the walkthrough on YouTube (spoiler warning)


Not all secrets are shown in this walkthrough, try and find them yourself ;)

updated page to add walkthrough video, no changes made to the game :)
